text: howard_wolowitz Alright , just a few more feet , and ... here we are gentlemen , the Gates of Elzebub .
sheldon_cooper Good lord !
raj_koothrappali Oooh .
leonard_hofstadter Do n't panic , this is what the last 97 hours have been about .
howard_wolowitz Stay frosty , there 's a horde of armed goblins on the other side of that gate guarding the Sword of Azeroth .
leonard_hofstadter Warriors , unsheathe your weapons , magic wielders raise your wands .
sheldon_cooper Lock and load .
howard_wolowitz Raj , blow up the gates .
raj_koothrappali Blowing the gates . Control , shift , B ! Oh , my God , so many goblins !
howard_wolowitz Do n't just stand there , slash and move , slash and move .
leonard_hofstadter Stay in formation .
howard_wolowitz Leonard , you 've got one on your tail .
leonard_hofstadter That 's alright , my tail 's prehensile , I 'll swat him off .
raj_koothrappali I 've got him Leonard . Tonight I spice my meat with goblin blood !
leonard_hofstadter Raj , no , it 's a trap , they 're flanking us !
raj_koothrappali Oooh , he 's got me .
howard_wolowitz Sheldon , he 's got Raj , use your sleath spell . Sheldon ! Sheldon !
sheldon_cooper I 've got the Sword of Azeroth !
leonard_hofstadter Forget the sword , Sheldon , help Raj .
sheldon_cooper There is no more Sheldon , I am the Swordmaster !
howard_wolowitz Leonard look out !
leonard_hofstadter Dammit man , we 're dying here .
sheldon_cooper Goodbye , peasants .
leonard_hofstadter The bastard teleported .
raj_koothrappali He 's selling the Sword of Azeroth on ebay .
leonard_hofstadter You betrayed us for money , who are you ?
sheldon_cooper I 'm a rogue knight elf , do n't you people read character descriptions ? Wait , wait , wait , somebody just clicked ' buy it now . '
howard_wolowitz I am the Swordmaster !
sheldon_cooper Wooh , I 'm all sweaty , anybody want to log on to second life and go swimming , I just built a virtual pool .
leonard_hofstadter No , I ca n't look at you or your avatar right now .
howard_wolowitz Sounds like your neighbor 's home .
leonard_hofstadter Excuse me .
sheldon_cooper Do n't forget the mail you took accidentally on purpose so you 'd have an excuse to talk to her .
leonard_hofstadter Oh , right , right right right right .
howard_wolowitz Stealing snail mail , very old school , I like it .
leonard_hofstadter Penny , the mailman did it again , he ... Oh ! Sorry .
penny Um , no , hi Leonard , this is Doug , Doug , this is my neighbor Leonard .
doug What 's up bro .
leonard_hofstadter Not much . Bro .
penny Is , is everything okay .
leonard_hofstadter Uh , yeah , uh , I just , I got your mail again , here .
penny Thank you , I 've got to talk to that mailman .
leonard_hofstadter Oh no , that 's probably not such a good idea . Civil servants have a documented propensity to , you know , snap .
penny Okay , well , thank you , again .
leonard_hofstadter No problem . Bye . Oh , and , bye , bro !
sheldon_cooper Penny for your thoughts .
raj_koothrappali What 's the matter .
leonard_hofstadter No , I 'm fine . Penny 's fine , the guy she 's kissing is really fine and ... .
howard_wolowitz Kissing , what kind of kissing ? Cheeks ? Lips ? Chaste ? French ?
leonard_hofstadter What is wrong with you ?
howard_wolowitz I 'm a romantic .
sheldon_cooper Please do n't tell me that your hopeless infatuation is devolving into pointless jealousy .
leonard_hofstadter No , I 'm not jealous , I 'm just a little concerned for her . I did n't like the look of the guy that she was with .
howard_wolowitz Because he looked better than you ?
leonard_hofstadter Yeah . He was kinda dreamy .

sheldon_cooper Well , at least now you can retrieve the black box from the twisted smouldering wreckage that was once your fantasy of dating her , and analyze the data so that you do n't crash into geek mountain again .
howard_wolowitz I disagree , love is not a sprint , it 's a marathon . A relentless pursuit that only ends when she falls into your arms . Or hits you with the pepper spray .
leonard_hofstadter Well , I 'm done with Penny . I 'm going to be more realistic and go after someone my own speed .
raj_koothrappali Like who ?
leonard_hofstadter I do n't know . Olivia Geiger ?
sheldon_cooper The dietician at the cafeteria with the limp and the lazy eye ?
leonard_hofstadter Yeah .

sheldon_cooper Well , I do n't think you have a shot there . I have noticed that Lesley Winkle recently started shaving her legs . Now , given that winter is coming one can only assume that she is signalling sexual availability .
howard_wolowitz I do n't know , you guys work in the same lab .
leonard_hofstadter So ?
howard_wolowitz There are pitfalls , trust me , I know . When it comes to sexual harassment law I 'm ... a bit of a self - taught expert .
leonard_hofstadter Look , Howard , if I were to ask Lesley Winkle out it would just be for dinner , I 'm not going to walk into the lab , ask her to strip naked and dance for me .
howard_wolowitz Oh , then you 're probably okay .
leonard_hofstadter Hello Lesley .
leslie_winkle Hi Leonard .
leonard_hofstadter Lesley I would like to propose an experiment .
leslie_winkle Goggles , Leonard .
leonard_hofstadter Right . Lesley , I would like to propose an experiment .
leslie_winkle Hang on . I 'm trying to see how long it takes a five hundred kilowatt oxygen iodine laser to heat up my cup o ' noodles .
leonard_hofstadter Pfff , I 've done it , about two seconds , 2.6 for minestrone . Anyway , I was thinking more of a bio - social exploration with a neuro - chemical overlay .
leslie_winkle Wait , are you asking me out ?

leonard_hofstadter I was going to characterise it as the modification of our colleague / friendship paradigm , with the addition of a date - like component . But we do n't need to quibble over terminology .
leslie_winkle What sort of experiment would you propose ?

leonard_hofstadter There is a generally accepted pattern in this area , I would pick you up , take you to a restaurant , then we would see a movie , probably a romantic comedy featuring the talents of Hugh Grant or Sandra Bullock .

leslie_winkle Interesting . And would you agree that the primary way we would evaluate either the success or failure of the date would be based on the bio - chemical reaction during the goodnight kiss .
leonard_hofstadter Heartrate , pheromones , etc , yes .
leslie_winkle Well , why do n't we just stipulate that the date goes well and move to the key variable .
leonard_hofstadter You mean , kiss you now ?
leslie_winkle Yes .
leonard_hofstadter Can you define the parameters of the kiss ?
leslie_winkle Closed mouth but romantic . Mint ?
leonard_hofstadter Thank you . . Shall I count down from three ?
leslie_winkle No , I think it needs to be spontaneous .
leslie_winkle What do you think .
leonard_hofstadter You proposed the experiment , I think you should present your findings first .
leslie_winkle Fair enough . On the plus side , it was a good kiss , reasonable technique , no extraneous spittle . On the other hand , no arousal .
leonard_hofstadter None ?
leslie_winkle None .
leonard_hofstadter Ah . Well , thank you for your time .
leslie_winkle Thank you .
leonard_hofstadter None at all ?
howard_wolowitz Sheldon , if you were a robot , and I knew and you did n't , would you want me to tell you ?
sheldon_cooper That depends . When I learn that I 'm a robot , will I be able to handle it ?
howard_wolowitz Maybe , although the history of science - fiction is not on your side .
sheldon_cooper Uh , let me ask you this . When I learn that I 'm a robot , would I be bound by Asimov 's three laws of robotics ?
raj_koothrappali You might be bound by them right now .
howard_wolowitz That 's true . Have you ever harmed a human being , or through inaction allowed a human being to come to harm ?
sheldon_cooper Of course not .
howard_wolowitz Have you ever harmed yourself , or allowed yourself to be harmed except in cases where a human being would have been endangered ?
sheldon_cooper Well , no .
howard_wolowitz I smell robot .
leonard_hofstadter Hey , what 's going on .
sheldon_cooper The internet 's been down for half an hour .
raj_koothrappali Also , Sheldon may be a robot .
howard_wolowitz So , how did it go with Lesley ?
leonard_hofstadter Oh , we tried kissing , but the earth did n't move . I mean any more than the 383 miles that it was going to move anyway .

sheldon_cooper Oh , I 've seen that look before . This is just going to be two weeks of moping and tedious emo songs , and calling me to come down to pet stores to look at cats . I do n't know if I can take it .
raj_koothrappali You could power down .
howard_wolowitz Well , as usual , Wolowitz has the solution . I happen to know a place where there are plenty of eligible women , and Leonard could have his pick .
instructor Remember the Latin hips . Shoulders stay still , and we sway . One two three . Five six seven .
howard_wolowitz I think Mrs Tishman 's got her eye on you . I 've been there , you 're in for a treat .
sheldon_cooper Oh , good lord .
leonard_hofstadter You do n't know me , you do n't wear my chains ... God , that 's a good song .
sheldon_cooper If you 're compiling a mix CD for a double suicide . Oh , I hope that scratching post is for you .
leonard_hofstadter I know what you 're thinking , I 've taken your asthma into account . There 's a feline geneticist in San Diego who has developed the cutest little hypo - allergenic calicos .
sheldon_cooper Leonard , listen to me ... .
leonard_hofstadter I 've been thinking about names , I 'm kind of torn between Einstein , Newton and Sergeant Fuzzyboots .
sheldon_cooper Leonard , do you really think you can satisfy your need for a relationship with a genetically altered cat ?
leonard_hofstadter Maybe , if it 's a cute little cuddly cat .
sheldon_cooper Oh , come on , Leonard ! This is obviously about Penny .
leonard_hofstadter It does n't matter . The woman 's not interested in me , the woman rejected me .

sheldon_cooper Okay , look , I think that you have as much of a chance of having a sexual relationship with Penny as the Hubble Telescope does of discovering at the center of every black hole is a little man with a flashlight searching for a circuit breaker . Nevertheless , I do feel obligated to point out to you that she did no reject you . You did not ask her out .
leonard_hofstadter You 're right . I did n't ask her out , I should ask her out .
sheldon_cooper No . No , now that was not my point . My point was , do n't buy a cat .
leonard_hofstadter No , but you 're right . I should march over there and ask her out .
sheldon_cooper Oh , goody , we 're getting a cat .
penny Ah , hey Leonard .
leonard_hofstadter Good afternoon Penny , so hi , hey . Uh ... I was wondering if you had plans for dinner .
penny Uh , do you mean dinner tonight ?
leonard_hofstadter There is an inherent ambiguity in the word dinner . Technically it refers to the largest meal of the day whenever it is consumed , so , to clarify here , by dinner I mean supper .
penny Supper ?
leonard_hofstadter Or dinner . I was thinking six thirty , if you can go , or a different time .
penny Uh , six thirty 's great .
leonard_hofstadter Really ? Great !
penny Yeah , I like hanging out with you guys .
leonard_hofstadter Us guys ?
penny You know , Sheldon , Howard , Raj , who all 's coming ?

leonard_hofstadter They ... might all be there . Or a subset of them might be there , uh , algebraically speaking there are too many unknowns , for example Sheldon had Quizznos for lunch , sometimes he finds that filling , other times he does n't , it 's no fault of Quizznos , they have a varied menu .
penny Okay , whatever , it sounds like fun .
leonard_hofstadter Great . Did we say a time ?
penny Six thirty .
leonard_hofstadter And that 's still good for you .
penny It 's fine .
leonard_hofstadter Cos it 's not carved in stone .
penny No , six thirty 's great .
leonard_hofstadter I 'll get my chisel .
penny Why ?
leonard_hofstadter To ... carve the ... okay , I 'll see you six thirty .
leonard_hofstadter How do I look ?
sheldon_cooper Could you be more specific ?
leonard_hofstadter Can you tell I 'm perspiring a little ?
sheldon_cooper No . The dark crescent - shaped patterns under your arms conceal it nicely . What time is your date ?
leonard_hofstadter Six thirty .
sheldon_cooper Perfect , that gives you two hours and fifteen minutes for that dense molecular cloud of Aramis to dissipate .
leonard_hofstadter Is it too much ?
sheldon_cooper Not if you 're a rugby team .
leonard_hofstadter By the way , if it should ever come up , you did n't join us because you stuffed yourself with a chicken carbonara sub at Quizznos .
sheldon_cooper Why would I join you ?
leonard_hofstadter No reason . Oh , you know what , maybe this is n't such a good idea .
sheldon_cooper Oh , no , no , no , well now , there 's always the possibility that alcohol and poor judgment on her part might lead to a nice romantic evening .
leonard_hofstadter You 're right , alcohol , poor judgment , it could go well .

sheldon_cooper Of course , there 's the other possibility that this date kicks off a rather unpleasant six months of the two of you passing awkwardly in the hall until one of you breaks down and moves to another zip code .
leonard_hofstadter You could have stopped at ' it could go well . '
sheldon_cooper If I could of , I would of .

leonard_hofstadter I mean , I 'm a perfectly nice guy . There 's no reason we could n't go to the restaurant and have a lovely dinner . Maybe take a walk afterwards , talk about things we have in common , ' you love pottery ? I love pottery ! ' You know , there 's a pause , we both know what 's happening , I lean in , we kiss , it 's a little tentative at first but then I realize , she 's kissing me back , and she 's biting my lower lip , you know , she wants me , this thing is going the distance , we 're going to have sex ! Oh God ! Oh , my God !
sheldon_cooper Is the sex starting now ?
leonard_hofstadter I 'm having a panic attack .
sheldon_cooper Oh , okay , well then , calm down .
leonard_hofstadter If I could calm down I would n't be having a panic attack , that 's why they call it a panic attack .
sheldon_cooper Alright , alright , well , just , sit down , yes , sit down , now close your eyes .
leonard_hofstadter Why ?
sheldon_cooper Just do it .
leonard_hofstadter Okay .
sheldon_cooper Now try to increase your alpha - wave activity .
leonard_hofstadter What ?

sheldon_cooper It 's a bio - feedback technique , it 's relaxation through brain - wave manipulation , I read a paper about it in the Journal of American Neuroscience , it was a little sparsely sourced but I think the basic science is valid , I probably have it here somewhere .
leonard_hofstadter Oh , who am I kidding , I ca n't go through with this , you need to call her and cancel .
sheldon_cooper Me ?
leonard_hofstadter Yes .
sheldon_cooper What should I tell her .
leonard_hofstadter I do n't know . Tell her I 'm sick .
sheldon_cooper Okay .

leonard_hofstadter Not the kind of illness that will make her want to come over and take care of me , but nothing so critical that she 'll feel uncomfortable going out with me in the future if I want to try this again .
sheldon_cooper Got it . So I 'm assuming nothing venereal . I 'll just tell her that you had a routine colonoscopy and have n't quite bounced back .
leonard_hofstadter Give me the phone .
sheldon_cooper But I thought you wanted to cancel ?
leonard_hofstadter I ca n't because if I do n't show up she 'll still be expecting you .
sheldon_cooper Why would she be expecting me ?
leonard_hofstadter Stop asking me all these questions , I need to take another shower .
penny So are the rest of the guys meeting us here ?
leonard_hofstadter Oh , yeah , no . Turns out that Raj and Howard had to work , and Sheldon had a colonoscopy and he has n't quite bounced back yet .
penny Ooh , my uncle just had a colonoscopy .
leonard_hofstadter You 're kidding , well , then , that 's something we have in common .
penny How ?
leonard_hofstadter We both have people in our lives who ... want to nip intestinal polyps in the bud .
penny So , what 's new in the world of physics ?
leonard_hofstadter Nothing .
penny Really , nothing ?

leonard_hofstadter Well , with the exception of string theory , not much has happened since the 1930 's , and you ca n't prove string theory , at best you can say ' hey , look , my idea has an internal logical consistency . '
penny Ah . Well I 'm sure things will pick up .
leonard_hofstadter What 's new at the Cheesecake Factory ?
penny Oh , uh , not much . We do have a chocolate key lime that 's moving pretty well .
leonard_hofstadter Good . Good . And what about your , uh , hallway friend .
penny Doug ? Oh , yeah , I dunno , I mean , he 's nice and funny , but ... .
waitress Can I get you started with some drinks ?
leonard_hofstadter No , You were saying , but ... .
penny I 'd like a drink .
leonard_hofstadter Just say the but thing about Doug and then I 'll get her back .
penny Okay , well , you know , it 's just me . I 'm still getting over this break - up with Kurt , and this thing with Doug would be just rebound sex .
leonard_hofstadter Ugh , do n't get me started on rebound sex .
penny It 's just , it 's my pattern . I break up , then I find some cute guy , and then it 's just thirty six meaningless of ... well , you know .
leonard_hofstadter I 'm not sure that I do . Um , is that one thirty - six hour experience , or is it thirty six hours spread out over say , one ... glorious summer .
penny No , it 's usually over a weekend , and trust me , you do not feel good after it .
leonard_hofstadter Well , chafing , right ?
penny Emotionally .
leonard_hofstadter Of course , yeah , emotional chafing . Hey , do you want to see something cool ? I can make this olive go into this glass without touching it .
penny How ?
leonard_hofstadter Physics .
penny Wow , centrifugal force !

leonard_hofstadter Actually , it 's centripetal force , which is an inward force generated by the glass acting on the olive . Excuse me . Now , if you were riding on the olive , you 'd be in a non - inertial reference frame , and would .
penny Are you okay ?
leonard_hofstadter Yeah , I 'm okay . Did you spill ketchup ?
penny No .
leonard_hofstadter I 'm not okay .
penny Are you sure you do n't want to go to the emergency room ?
leonard_hofstadter No , no , I 'm okay , it 's stopped bleeding .
penny I know , but you did throw up . Is n't that a sign of a concussion ?
leonard_hofstadter Yes , but I get car sick too , so ... .
penny Okay .
leonard_hofstadter Sorry about your car , by the way .
penny Oh , no , it 's fine , you got most of it out the window .
leonard_hofstadter The poor guy on the bike . I had a nice time .
penny Yeah , me too . Um , good night . Leonard ?
leonard_hofstadter Yeah .
penny Was this supposed to be a date ?
leonard_hofstadter This ? No . No , of course not , this was just you and me hanging out with a bunch of guys who did n't show up , because of work and a colonoscopy .
penny Okay , I was just checking .

leonard_hofstadter When I take a girl out on a date , and I do , she knows she 's been dated . Capital D. Bold face , underline , like Day - ted . I think I might have a little concussion , I 'm going to go lay down for a while , good night .
sheldon_cooper So , how was your date ?
leonard_hofstadter Awesome !
sheldon_cooper Score one for liquor and poor judgment .
